channel.title: How do you get a free smf forum like this one?
channel.description:
How do you get a proper forum like this one, because when it says make one for free, you need .smfforfree3.com, which is really long, I need it to say this at the bottom:
Powered by SMF 1.1.3 | SMF © 2006-2007, Simple Machines LLC
Like this one. I no it can be done because people talk about it.
Many Thanks Musicmad441

item.title: How do you get a free smf forum like this one?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You register on www.awardspace.com or www.hyperphp.com (Choise Free hosting.).

Then you make a database.

And so go on filemanager and upload the forum.
Go on Config.php on your site. (You will get a subdomain or you can choise one from the site)

Then do as it said.

Then you will have a forum.

I can help more if you start and says where you got problems in the prosses.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a free smf forum like this one?

item.description:

item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

item.title: How do you get a free smf forum like this one?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

musicmad441:

Where is the upload Option?

Tbh, I don’t think it’s worth walking through each step of the way with you if you don’t even know how to upload. If it was a website, I’d be fine. But it’s some forums that no one, with the exception of a few friends, would ever join.

But therealjdb made a great guide which you should read: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,167950.0.html

Read full topic

The documentation on the SMF site should answer any further questions you have.
